name: Swingspell
description:
You're an apprentice wizard, training under the sometimes scatterbrained Master Wyman - but one day you return to the tower and find that he's turned himself into a teapot! As his apprentice, he gives you his magic wand, and sends you on a quest to help him change back to normal.

Jump, swing, and dash around as you collect the three missing artifacts to bring the magic back and reverse the spell!

--- Credits ---

Christopher Pugliese, Annabel Prodnuk, Justin Buergi, Jennifer Zhang, Jae Won (Agnes) Lee, Li Zheng, Ysabelle Coutu
